item.title: Kaggle Meetup: E-Summit 20
item.description: Data Science Group in collaboration with E-Summit IIT R, and Kaggle is organising the very first Data Enthusiasts Meetup in Roorkee.

item.title: Sarcasm Detection using BERT
item.description: What Is Sarcasm? Sarcasm, a sharp and ironic utterance designed to cut or to cause pain, is often used to express strong emotions, such as contempt, mockery or bitterness.
